plot outline: A group of friends go to an isolated house in the middle of the night. Certain incidents that happen in the house make them feel like they aren't the only ones in the house. Scared and confused, the bunch of youth try to escape from the house. Watch the movie to find out what happens next.
title: Ek Thriller Night
plot: A group of friends go to an isolated house in the middle of the night. Certain incidents that happen in the house make them feel like they aren't the only ones in the house. Scared and confused, the bunch of youth try to escape from the house. Watch the movie to find out what happens next.
